name: Missilium
description:
You are the commander of the new "Missilium" project, a missile launcher and interceptor that promises to bring great advantage in future wars.

But the future is closer than everyone thought, a surprise attack of the enemy requires you use the newly created Missilium to defend and win this unexpected war.

  • Battle over 15 levels in campaign mode, with two last very special and different levels.
  • Fight along 4 different scenarios, in day and night modes.
  • Different win and loose conditions in all battles.
  • Unlimited hours of game play with Free Play mode.
  • Use your game score to acquire extras and powerups to aid you in your mission.
